form:FormGroup.label: Embedding Model
form:FormGroup.helpText: Choose the AI model to convert field data to vectors.

form:FormGroup.label: Vector Similarity Function Type
form:FormGroup.helpText: Vector similarity function; used in search to return top K most similar vectors to a target vector. This is a label describing the method used during indexing and searching of the vectors in order to determine the nearest neighbors.

form:FormGroup.label: Segment Size
form:FormGroup.helpText: The maximum size of the segment used during vectorisation, defined in tokens.

form:FormGroup.label: Overlap Size
form:FormGroup.helpText: The maximum size of the overlap, defined in tokens. Only full sentences are considered for the overlap.

form:FormGroup.label: Nearest Neighbour Count
form:FormGroup.helpText: The number of nearest neighbors to gather when querying.
